moves.1. Nf3 h5 2. e4 Rh6: Never a good idea.  Almost never.
moves.3. Bc4 e6 4. d4 c5: Ok, what have you got against your king's rook?
moves.5. Ne5: No.  BxRh6!  Rooks are worth more than bishops.  Trade up, man!  Fill your boots!
moves.6... gxh6: NxBh6 would have at least preserved the pawn structure.  Doubled rook pawns are cannon fodder.
moves.8... h4: ?  That is going to cost a pawn, bishop, AND knight.  Slaughter of all the king's men.
moves.9. Qxf7+ Kd8 10. Qxf8+ Kc7 11. Qxg8 Qb4: Pd6 I think leads to a knight or bishop.  Though yeah, looks like you got Nc3.  Probably better.
